topic.title: Hardware Installation Guide
topic.shortdesc: Hardware Installation Guide for Yeastar K2 IPPBX.

section.title: About this guide
section.p: This guide describes the hardware indicators and ports on the Yeastar K2 IPPBX, and provides instructions of rack installation, and cable connections of the PBX.

section.title: Audience
section.p: This guide is for the person who wants to install the Yeastar K2 IPPBX device.
